entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bow Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.9°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 60 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
